com.zendesk.sdk.model.network

Interface ErrorResponse

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RetrofitErrorResponse

    public interface ErrorResponse
    Represents an error response from an API call.

    This interface is used to wrap various framework error responses, such as RetrofitError

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NON_HTTP_ERROR 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getReason()
      Gets the human readable error from the server.
      int getStatus()
      Gets the Http response status code
      boolean isNetworkError()
      Determines whether this was an error caused by a failure in network communications or if it was a client or server error.

    • Field Detail

      • NON_HTTP_ERROR

        static final int NON_HTTP_ERROR
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isNetworkError

        boolean isNetworkError()
        Determines whether this was an error caused by a failure in network communications or if it was a client or server error.

        If this is a network error retrying may work but if this returns false the chances are that repeating the request will not work.

        Returns:
        true if this was a server error, false otherwise.

      • getReason

        String getReason()
        Gets the human readable error from the server.

        If the server responded with a 422 this would be something like "Unprocessable Entity"

        Returns:
        the human readable error

      • getStatus

        int getStatus()
        Gets the Http response status code

        For example if the endpoint was not found this would be 404

        Returns:
        the http response status code
